title: "Marriage of Artificial Intelligence & Biology Spawns RNA-Targeting Startup Atomic AI"
excerpt: "Atomic AI combines artificial intelligence analysis with wet lab experiments to discover small molecules capable of drugging RNA. The startup, based on technology initially developed at Stanford, is backed by a $35 million Series A round of financing."
